text: (Nampikkaiyalarkale!) Unkalilulla ankalil oruvarukkum muham'matu (napi avarkal) tantaiyaka irukkavillai. (Akave, avar jaitukku evvaru tantaiyavar?) Eninum, avar allahvutaiya tutarakavum, napimarkalukku (iruti) muttiraiyakavum (iruti napiyakavum) irukkirar. (Akave, avarukkup pinnar oru tutaraiyum anuppamattan.) Allah anaittaiyum nankarintavanaka irukkiran
